name: Green Energy Champions
title: Leading in Renewable Energy Consumption
description: In 2021, DR Congo achieved a remarkable 96.3% renewable energy consumption, showcasing its commitment to sustainable energy sources.

name: Waste Not, Want Not
title: High Utilization of Combustible Renewables and Waste
description: As of 2022, 92.9% of DR Congo's energy comes from combustible renewables and waste, highlighting efficient resource use.

name: Import Boom
title: Rapid Growth in Imports of Goods and Services
description: In 2023, DR Congo saw an 85.6% growth in imports, indicating a surge in demand for foreign goods and services.

name: Mineral Wealth
title: Significant Mineral Rents Contribution to GDP
description: In 2021, mineral rents accounted for 28.8% of DR Congo's GDP, underscoring the country's rich mineral resources.

name: Education Challenges
title: High Percentage of Out-of-School Primary Children
description: In 2019, 63.2% of primary school-age children were out of school, highlighting significant educational access issues.

name: Poverty Struggles
title: High Poverty Headcount Ratios
description: In 2020, 98% of the population lived below $8.30 a day, reflecting widespread poverty challenges.

name: Trade Coverage
title: Complete Binding Coverage for All Products
description: In 2020, DR Congo achieved 100% binding coverage for all products, ensuring comprehensive trade agreements.

name: Export Powerhouse
title: Dominance in Ores and Metals Exports
description: In 2023, ores and metals made up 76.3% of merchandise exports, showcasing DR Congo's strong mining sector.

name: Transport Services Leader
title: High Contribution of Transport Services to Exports
description: In 2023, transport services accounted for 87% of commercial service exports, highlighting a robust transport sector.

name: High and Dry
title: Minimal Urban Flood Risk
description: In 2015, only 0.0001% of DR Congo's urban land area was below 5 meters in elevation, minimizing flood risks for urban populations.

name: Travel? Not So Much
title: Limited Travel Service Exports
description: As of 2023, travel services constituted just 2.43% of DR Congo's service exports, highlighting a potential area for growth in the tourism sector.

name: Gas? What's That?
title: Negligible Natural Gas Production
description: In 2018, only 0.009% of DR Congo's electricity was produced from natural gas, indicating a reliance on other energy sources.

name: Low Carbon Footprint
title: Minimal CO2 Emissions from Buildings
description: In 2023, DR Congo's CO2 emissions from buildings were a mere 0.0002 Mt, reflecting a low carbon footprint in the building sector.

name: Water Woes
title: Limited Access to Basic Drinking Water
description: By 2022, only 35.1% of the population had access to basic drinking water services, with rural areas even more underserved at 13.8%.

name: Money Matters
title: Low Broad Money as a GDP Percentage
description: In 2018, broad money accounted for just 12.4% of DR Congo's GDP, suggesting limited financial liquidity in the economy.

name: Few Scholars
title: Scarce Doctoral Attainment
description: As of 2016, only 0.02% of DR Congo's population aged 25+ had attained a doctoral degree, indicating a gap in advanced education.

name: Research Rarity
title: Minimal Researchers in R&D
description: In 2015, DR Congo had only 10 researchers per million people, highlighting a need for investment in research and development.
